title: Baahubali 2: The Conclusion (Tamil Version)
writer: Vijayendra Prasad, S.S. Rajamouli, C.H. Vijay Kumar
short_cast: Prabhas, Rana Daggubati, Anushka Shetty, Tamanna, Sathyaraj, Ramya Krishnan, Nassar, Subbaraju
cast: Prabhas, Rana Daggubati, Anushka Shetty, Tamanna, Sathyaraj, Ramya Krishnan, Nassar, Subbaraju
m_desc: Suitable for persons aged 16 and above and under parental guidance for people under age of 16
desc: To avenge his father's death, a young man leads an army into battle against a cruel tyrant in this Tamil conclusion to the historic saga.
